title: History page: show card names and absolute timestamps in change history feed

requirements.summary: Improve History page entries by resolving card IDs to card names when possible and displaying an absolute timestamp alongside the existing relative time, without changing pagination/infinite-load behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: History list items show card name(s) next to card ID(s) when the card(s) still exist in the user’s collection (fallback to ID-only when not resolvable).
Each history entry shows an absolute timestamp string in the UI (not only as a hover title), while keeping the existing relative-time display.
The History page remains paginated/infinite-load as it is now (no regression to loading all entries at once).

file_operations.description: Enhance history list rendering to (1) fetch the user’s current cards (via existing query hook) and build a lookup map from cardId -> card name for resolving entry.cardIds to display "<id> (<name>)" when available, and (2) render an explicit absolute timestamp string (using existing formatTimestamp) in the visible UI alongside the existing relative time display; keep the existing useGetChangeHistory infinite pagination and 'Load more' behavior unchanged.
